survey_name: Gen Z Financial Literacy and Digital Banking Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand Gen Z's financial literacy levels and preferences regarding digital banking services to help financial institutions tailor their offerings.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use digital banking services (e.g., mobile banking apps, online banking)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use digital banking services (e.g., mobile banking apps, online banking)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you find most useful? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Limit to 3 selections to prioritize preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you find most useful? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is your biggest challenge when managing personal finances?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Use a text box with a 200-character limit.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Character limit: 200.

script.question_text: What is your biggest challenge when managing personal finances?

questions.question_text: Have you ever used a financial literacy app or tool (e.g., credit score monitoring, investment simulators)?
questions.client_notes: Binary single-choice question. Follow up with Q5 if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Route to Q5 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you ever used a financial literacy app or tool (e.g., credit score monitoring, investment simulators)?

questions.question_text: Which financial literacy tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an 'Other' option for unspecified tools. Ensure 'Other' triggers a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Add text field for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which financial literacy tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
